name: Rabbit Cafe Ver 0.1a
description:
Introduction

This game is created in Global Game Jam 2023 - Rabbit Cafe.

Player is a rabbit who wants to open a cafe shop, he use his own secret recipe to brew coffee (use carrot residue to brew carrot coffee, P.S. please don't do it in the real world). Also, he can build robots to help him to grow carrot, grinder carrot into carrot residue, and fartharmore to help he to brew coffee. We think this concept is better to make as a game like Overcooked, and that may be so fun.

Unfortunately, we cannot build a playable prototype game that match our concept within 48 hours at GGJ, so we decide use more a week to finish it. Finally we use 20 days to finish it, and bring out this game.

 

Controls Keyboard Gamepad/joystick

 

Installation

Unzip and execute.
This game requires Microsoft Visual C++ Runtime and DirectX Runtime to execute.

 

Credits

Main Programmer/Developer: Cluias Lao
Co-operate Programmer: Bone Ng
Concept Art: Cluias Lao, Bone Ng
3D Artist: Cluias Lao, Bone Ng
2D Artist: Bone Ng
Animator: Cluias Lao
UI Design: Cluias Lao
Level Design: Cluias Lao
VFX: Cluias Lao
Voice-over: Emily Pun
